name: Charles BARNES, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (SPS TECHNOLOGIES), Respondent
name_abbreviation: Barnes v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Charles BARNES, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (SPS TECHNOLOGIES), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of May, 2004, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED and this matter is REMANDED to the Workers’ Compensation Judge for issuance of an amended decision that complies with Section 422(a) of the Workers’ Compensation Act, 77 P.S. § 834 and Daniels v. Workers’ Compensation Appeal Board (Tristate Transport), 574 Pa.61, 828 A.2d 1043 (2003).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Charles BARNES, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (SPS TECHNOLOGIES), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 11, 2004.
